subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Isiah Thomas felt the warmth of the crowd once again when the Pistons, celebrating their 50-year anniversary, named him to an all-time team. Topping that off, the Knicks won.
snippet: Isiah Thomas felt the warmth of the crowd once again when the Pistons, celebrating their 50-year anniversary, named him to an all-time team. Topping that off, the Knicks won.
